targets.query: SELECT last("/components/component/properties/property/state/value_float")  * -1 + 100 FROM /components/ WHERE ("device"::tag =~ /^$Device$/ AND "/components/component/@name"::tag =~ /Engine|RE/ AND "/components/component/properties/property/@name"::tag = 'cpu-utilization-idle') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "/components/component/@name"::tag fill(null)

SELECT last("/network-instances/network-instance/protocols/protocol/bgp/neighbors/neighbor/state/session-state") FROM /network-instances/ WHERE ("device"::tag =~ /^$Device$/ AND "/network-instances/network-instance/protocols/protocol/bgp/neighbors/neighbor/@neighbor-address"::tag =~ /^$bgp_peers$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "/network-instances/network-instance/protocols/protocol/bgp/neighbors/neighbor/@neighbor-address"::tag

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "/interfaces/" WITH KEY = "device"
list.name: Device
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "/interfaces/" WITH KEY = "device"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "/interfaces/" WITH KEY = "/interfaces/interface/@name" WHERE "device" =~ /^$Device$/
list.name: Interface
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "/interfaces/" WITH KEY = "/interfaces/interface/@name" WHERE "device" =~ /^$Device$/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM /network-instances/ WITH KEY = "/network-instances/network-instance/protocols/protocol/bgp/neighbors/neighbor/@neighbor-address" WHERE "device" =~ /^$Device$/
list.name: bgp_peers
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM /network-instances/ WITH KEY = "/network-instances/network-instance/protocols/protocol/bgp/neighbors/neighbor/@neighbor-address" WHERE "device" =~ /^$Device$/

list.definition: SELECT "/network-instances/network-instance/protocols/protocol/bgp/neighbors/neighbor/@neighbor-address","/network-instances/network-instance/protocols/protocol/bgp/neighbors/neighbor/enable-bfd/state/enabled" FROM /network-instances/ WHERE "/network-instances/network-instance/protocols/protocol/bgp/neighbors/neighbor/@neighbor-address" =~/.*/ AND "/network-instances/network-instance/protocols/protocol/bgp/neighbors/neighbor/enable-bfd/state/enabled" = True AND "device" =~ /^$Device$/ AND time > now() - 5m
list.name: enabled_bfd_sessions
list.query: SELECT "/network-instances/network-instance/protocols/protocol/bgp/neighbors/neighbor/@neighbor-address","/network-instances/network-instance/protocols/protocol/bgp/neighbors/neighbor/enable-bfd/state/enabled" FROM /network-instances/ WHERE "/network-instances/network-instance/protocols/protocol/bgp/neighbors/neighbor/@neighbor-address" =~/.*/ AND "/network-instances/network-instance/protocols/protocol/bgp/neighbors/neighbor/enable-bfd/state/enabled" = True AND "device" =~ /^$Device$/ AND time > now() - 5m
